participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Tom is a warm-hearted individual who enjoys sharing stories from his past and values community service. He has a playful side and loves to engage in light-hearted banter.
participant_1.background: I volunteer at a soup kitchen. I like watching war documentaries. I was poor growing up. I'm a retired gym teacher. Cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is introspective and candid about his struggles. He has a sense of humor that helps him cope with life's challenges and values deep connections with others.
participant_2.background: I am a recovering alcoholic. I take many medications and some of them make me see things. I am a 45 year old male. I now live in the city. I grew up on a farm.
